treatment.etymology: [Greek okto, eight, and blepharis, eyelash, alluding to peristome teeth]
treatment.description: Plants small, densely to loosely cespitose. Stems erect. Leaves crowded, erect to spreading-recurved, weakly bordered with elongate hyaline cells; chlorophyllose cells in a single layer; costa absent. Peristome with prostome present.
treatment.global_distribution: worldwide in tropical and subtropical regions.
